l:dependency.name: Jenkins Maven Release Plug-in Plug-in
l:dependency.l:description: A plug-in that enables you to perform releases using the maven-release-plugin from Jenkins.

l:dependency.name: Maven Release APIs
l:dependency.l:description: Tooling to release a project with Maven, saving a lot of repetitive, manual work.

l:dependency.name: Maven Release Manager
l:dependency.l:description: Tooling to release a project with Maven, saving a lot of repetitive, manual work.

l:dependency.name: Suppression for Access Modifier annotations
l:dependency.l:description: This module allows you to enable suppressions for turning off warnings about Restricted APIs. !!!WARNING!!! Classes are marked as @Restricted for a reason and this module should not be used lightly! It implies that the author does not intend for them to be used outside their defined scope and as such they may be changed/modified/removed at any stage without warning. A simple upgrade of the dependency may break your module. Use at your own risk. You should try to not use @Restricted classes in the first place, but if you _must_ use them, this is a less-brutal approach than just disabling the access-modifier-checker entirely
